title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10, app 75-B ยง 75-B.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10, app 75-B ยง 75-B.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

This appendix provides design and performance standards for
water treatment devices approved for use on individual household water
supplies. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10, app 75-B ยง
75-B.1

Sec. filed: Feb. 20, 1990 eff. Dec. 1, 1990; March 6, 1990 eff. Dec. 1, 1990. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
